name: Mega Cold
description:
Mega Cold is a game made for Mix and Game Jam with a theme of "DIMENSION CHANGE" (Take a game mechanic from one dimension and recreate it in another).

I decided to take on the idea of the game SUPERHOT and remade the "time only moves when you move" mechanic.

I had heaps of fun making it and I hope you will have playing it. It's really short (max 10 minutes) so why not give it a try?

If you're having troubles with the web build, try downloading the standalone version below.
